# Java 开源项目中文文档 20160518

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/java-kaiyuan-xiangmu-zhongwen-wendang-20160518
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/java-kaiyuan-xiangmu-zhongwen-wendang-20160518
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install java-kaiyuan-xiangmu-zhongwen-wendang-20160518
java-kaiyuan-xiangmu-zhongwen-wendang-20160518 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g java-kaiyuan-xiangmu-zhongwen-wendang-erlingyiliulingwuyiba
java-kaiyuan-xiangmu-zhongwen-wendang-erlingyiliulingwuyiba <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
